title: Expansions
content:
Each expansion for Earthborne Rangers contains new content to enhance your play experience. The complete list of expansions is as follows:

  • Legacy of the Ancestors adds a new narrative campaign that takes place after Lure of the Valley, complete with a new campaign guide, campaign tracker and map, along with new locations, path cards, and rewards.
  • Stewards of the Valley adds new Ranger cards for each of the backgrounds and specialties from the core set, as well as adding new personality cards and new aspect cards. It also adds an entirely new background set (Talespinner) and a new specialty set (Spirit Speaker), both of which can be chosen at character creation.
  • Moments on the Path adds exciting and narrative moments to your path deck and can be used at any point during your Lure of the Valley or Legacy of the Ancestors campaigns.
